channel.title: Personal Development on
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Development on

item.title: 10 Steps To Permanent Happiness
item.description: This is a lifetime journey that we will take together. I will be your teacher, guide, psychologist, motivator and friend. To be truly happy we need to learn and understand why we are unhappy, what is happiness and how we can achieve it. We have different types of happiness, but here we are going to be focused on permanent happiness. For permanent happiness, we have to make changes in our minds and soul.

item.title: Introduction to Song Tantra - Songwriting from the Soul!
item.description: In this course I teach you a special vocal technique that opens the voice and creative flow! My technique connects you to the creative energy from your soul, so you can create beautiful music that will entrance audiences to you and your music. I have personally have studied singing and sung professionally for over 20 years, graduated cum la mentored with pro- songwriters who write for celebrities and learn their songwriting techniques.

item.title: Resilience Masterclass: Build a Refugee Mindset for Survival
item.description: Resilience Masterclass: Build a Refuge Mindset for Survival to Thrival The Resilience Mindset- Survival Tips for the Worst Time of Your Life - For Refugees & Those Who Want Survival Skills Refugees are persons who are outside their country of origin for reasons of feared persecution, conflict, generalized violence, or other circumstances that have seriously disturbed public order and, as a result, require international protection. This is what I experience. I will help you to prepare and get ready mentally and physically to travel and be a successful refugee.

item.title: Time Management And Goal Planning: The Productivity Combo
item.description: What about setting 48-Hour Productivity from a 24-hour day? So many things, so little time, right? Wrong! Time management is all about working SMARTER, not harder! Time management, focus and motivation are the basis for planning and achieving our goals and being more productive. Distraction turns seemingly busy days into wasted time, producing a negative impact on our productivity. This course will show you the best time management and goal planning strategies to focus on what really matters, prioritizing those actions that lead to the achievement of our short and long term goals in order to fulfill your life.

item.title: How to find first Job in certain fields/ Common tips
item.description:
The goal of hiring managers is not just to hire people who need a job. It’s to hire people who believe in their organization, its mission and the work that’s involved in the job position. Every hiring manager knows: Hire people to do a job and they’ll work for your money. Hire people who believe in the work and they’ll work for their passion.
And this is not a case of “fake it until you make it.

item.title: How to Become a Facilitator: 7 Effective Skills
item.description: Have you ever felt like the task of becoming a leader and leading people to success is impossible? Well, it is no secret that the task may seem quite daunting and out of the realms of our possibilities. Well, the beauty of life is that nothing is impossible and with courage and willpower one can overcome their greatest fears and lead people to greatness. That is one of the main functions of a facilitator.

item.title: Neuroplasticity: Teach Your Brain To Work 3 Times Faster
item.description: If you have never imagined what living life on autopilot is, this may be because you are going all autopilot and not realizing it. Being conscious about our lives is the least we can do to actually live the better life. So, what does neuroplasticity have to do with it? Pretty easy. Neuroplasticity helps our brain to get out of the ‘comfort zone’, of sorts. It helps us learn new things, thus expanding our brain broad and wide for everything new the world can offer.

item.title: İş ve Özel Yaşamda Alışkanlıkları Yönetmenin Sırları
item.description: Alışkanlık, otomatikleşecek kadar çok tekrarlanmış davranıştır. Davranışlar duygulara, duygular ise kimliğinize bağlıdır. Altıncı his diye de ifade edebileceğimiz otomatik alışkanlıkları yaparken farketmeyiz bile. İçgüdülerimiz tarafından yönetildiğini düşündüğümüz bu alışkanlıklar aslında beynimizin ve vücudumuzun hiç düşünmediği alışkanlıklardır. İyi alışkanlıkları güçlendirerek, bunun duygu ve düşüncelerinize katkısını görebilirsiniz. Küçük değişimler ile büyük farklar yaratılabilir. Alışkanlıkların nasıl oluştuğunu öğrenmek değiştirmek ve geliştirmek için önemlidir. 21 günde yapılan alışkanlık olur dense de konu bu kadar basite indirgenemez.

item.title: Learn To Focus: Meditation & Mindfulness For ADHD
item.description: ADD and ADHD can make it hard to focus & get things done. You have lots of mental energy (that's why you're so smart!) but you have a hard time directing it to one thing at a time. Many people go through their entire lives in this scatter-brained state, jumping from thing to thing, never fully concentrating on, or actually enjoying, anything. This can lead to major school & career problems (not paying attention in class, not paying attention at work, not caring about what you're working on, bouncing from job to job, career to career, etc), and problems becoming a successful adult.

item.title: How Manipulation Works
Time Management Techniques 101: The Beginner's Guide
item.description: Planning your day does not necessarily mean filling out all your available hours with tasks and ending up working all day. Working non-stop all day will end up burning you out and you will end up not finishing and getting behind your schedule instead Finding the right moment for your different priorities you will find that you can accomplish more with less time. The goal of this course is you are going to be more effective and efficiency by getting things done with less time so that you have time to do things you enjoy doing it.

item.title: Habitually Better: Building habits to be your best self!
item.description:
Join the journey to become habitually better! Pursuing long term goals does not have to be a long shot. It does not have to take an inordinate amount of will power either. Join the journey to craft a focussed, effortless and satisfying path towards your future.
I have struggled with habit formation, and I empathize with you. Having seen how that powerful habits are and how some people face challenges in utilizing them, I believe that it should be made reachable to everyone and I would like to share this course as a humble guidance to those who are going through a similar journey.

item.title: Reinvent Your Life: Master Life Transformation Techniques
item.description: In this course, you will learn the Life Transformation Techniques for personal Development, Personal Transformation, and Finding Your Life Purpose. In just 10-minutes a day, The Personal Life Transformation Masterclass will help revolutionize your life by improving your mindset, goals, and personal and professional productivity. You'll unlock the potential concentration, confidence, and optimism you need to start moving forward again and again. Once you've mastered mentioned areas completely, you'll feel unstoppable and have total belief in your ability to achieve incredible results with ease.

item.title: First impression hack - cheat based on scientific evidence!
item.description: You’ll never get a second chance to make a great first impression.Summary of the courseIn other words, when you meet someone for the first time, you need to be on top of your game from the very beginning. The key is to build rapport. Rapport is the lubricant for social communication. When rapport is established, communication barriers go down and you will have the opportunity to make a lasting connection. This practice is used actively by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) to get interviewees to open up.

item.title: Secrets of Memory: 3 Ways of Memorising Like a Spy
item.description: Our brain is really stubborn at times. It doesn’t want to remember certain things, it doesn’t want to cope with the fact that you just have to remember certain information. Lucky us – this problem can be solved. This course is about memory, about memorizing like a spy, so that’s exactly what we are going to do. We are going to learn how to memorize like a spy. Spies have to remember a lot, their life depends on it.

item.title: Comunicazione: come gestirla in maniera efficace
item.description: In questo corso ti spiegherò nei minimi dettagli come poter superare le difficoltà del parlare in pubblico e rendere più incisivo il tuo modo di Comunicare. Esporrò tecniche precise e dettagliate, ti darò consigli teorici e pratici per far sì che tu possa padroneggiare nel migliore dei modi la Voce(intesa come Contenuto e Comunicazione Para-Verbale) ed il linguaggio del corpo (Comunicazione Non Verbale) spiegandoti l'importanza del tenere viva l'attenzione dall'esordio alla conclusione di un discorso.

item.title: Art of stress free Productivity -Plan & Execute Effectively
item.description: Objectives: Research shows that a large number of professionals fail to execute their action plan successfully. The problem often isn’t with planning but with executing the planning. It is very important to take a well-structured approach to implement and execute what is planned. The Art of Being Productive: Planning & Effective Execution is an online course, that will help professionals to overcome their most challenging execution obstacles on a working day and execute their tasks effectively to achieve better results.

item.title: How to Get Over a Break up
item.description: Breakups blow chunks. Whether it’s an amicable breakup or a horrible, crash-and-burn situation, you’ve invested a part of you into another person and must accept that a relationship that you once nurtured is dead and gone. Brain-mapping studies have shown that the same regions of the brain are activated when an addict is going through withdrawals as when someone is going through a breakup. Whether the relationship lasted three weeks or three years, breakups can leave us feeling heartbroken, lost and even physically ill.

item.title: A Letter For Myself: Self-Affirmations with MRS JOY
item.description:
A Letter For Myself: 56 Days To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind For A Healthy & Loving Relationship is developed to increase your love for yourself and for your partner or even for your future partner, if you don't have one yet.
“A Letter For Myself” is a self-development audio course from MRS JOY’s Academy, where you will find special narrations of MRS JOY, as you are talking with yourself. They help you to reprogram your subconscious mind and imprint the life you love to live.

item.title: Modern Job Interview Preparation, Tips & Tricks Masterclass
item.description: Modern businesses are hiring for culture, not just skills. Having a spot-on resume and cover letter is necessary, but it’s only the one third of the battle. Who you are as a person is just as important to your next employer as what you can do for them. Most of us have been taught a specific traditional method for job interviewing. Once we learn the traditional method, it can be hard to change our approach!

item.title: Most Common Job Interview Questions with Answer
item.description: (The course content has updated according to students' interest on 16th August 2019) ‘Why did you leave your last job?’ ‘What are your weaknesses?’ ‘If you were a type of fruit, what would you be, and why?’ OK, so some interview questions are easier to answer than others. But whilst you can’t predict exactly what you’ll be asked, any question has the potential to make you stumble – unless, of course, you’ve prepared in advance.

item.title: Automate your Job-Search with LoopCV in 2021
item.description: Welcome to the fifth course in Term 2 as part of the series "MBA in Artificial Intelligence Digital Marketing". Just imagine, how much time do you spend applying to jobs and all you get is a rejection letter after a week or a month's time? Let's get this right as we elaborate on this problem faced by every job-seeker out there. Do you actually spend a lot of time applying to a job, only to wait for weeks without any kind of positive feedback or response from recruiters and hiring managers?

item.title: How to Become a Firefighter!
item.description: Learn how a career as a firefighter can provide you with financial stability, allowing you to give back to your community and make you excited to come to work. Firefighting is a rewarding career that offers great opportunity for growth and advancement, amazing medical benefits and a high level of job satisfaction. This course will teach you how to prepare for your new career full of thrills and excitement while helping your community.

item.title: Mindfulness for Parents with MRS JOY
item.description:
Mindfulness For Parents is designed to support you to discover:
-What is Mindfulness and how it can help you and your family -The 3 Pillars of Mindfulness -How to bring Mindfulness into your daily activities -How to practice Mindfulness with your child – or kids, if you have more than one - How to develop more concentration - How to increase kindness, self-compassion and wellbeing to your life and in the lives of the ones you love and care.

item.title: Intelligence quotient IQ Test Questions and Answers
item.description:
TEST YOUR INTELLGENCE Intelligence quotient IQ Test Questions and Answers 2021 Measure students, employees, humans, scientists and child's intelligence, PSYCHOMETRIC and Personality
An intelligence quotient (IQ) is a total score derived from a set of standardized tests or subtests designed to assess human intelligence. The abbreviation "IQ" was coined by the psychologist William Stern for the German term Intelligenzquotient, his term for a scoring method for intelligence tests at University of Breslau he advocated in a 1912 book.

item.title: Effective Time Management Skills For A Productivity Boost
item.description: This course approaches time management from 3 unique angles: Time management in a single day Time management in a week Time management in your life to make sure that the tasks you work on are the right ones for your overall life direction, because if you are working on the wrong tasks, then all that time is mismanaged and wasted Try this course and its unique approach which ends at you looking at the bigger picture of your life.

item.title: Complete Confidence Building Course - Exude Confidence Now
item.description: Complete Confidence Building Course - Exude Confidence NowBuild Your Confidence - Increase Self-Esteem - Radiate More Confidence - Become a Truly Confident Person - Communication Imagine going through life filled with confidence. You are confident in your abilities, your talents, your communication skills, your appearance and in having an accurate sense of how others perceive you. and other people judge you as supremely confident (though not cocky or arrogant!) Confidence is not something you are born with.

item.title: Cultivating Gratitude with MRS JOY
item.description:
Here's what you'll discover inside of this life-changing online course with MRS JOY:
Learn that gratitude is a state of being. Learn how to use gratitude in your relationships to develop a deeper connection. Learn how the power of positive emotions and gratitude can change your life. Discover how practicing mindfulness and meditation can cultivate an attitude of gratitude. Discover what unbalanced gratitude is and how you can counteract it.

item.title: Digital Nomad Lifestyle: LIVE YOUR DREAM & Travel the World
item.description: IS IT POSSIBLE TO LIVE YOUR DREAM LIFE WITHOUT WORKING SO HARD? DOES IT HAVE TO TAKE SO MUCH EFFORT, STRESS, AND ENERGY TO HAVE A LIFE THAT DEEPLY FULFILS YOU? HONOR AND TRUST YOUR PROCESS, AND SURRENDER TO THE MAGIC OF LIFE!!! BEING A DIGITAL NOMAD MEANS LIVING LIFE 100% ON YOUR OWN TERMS!!! From leaving behind the corporate life of a consistent and often capped salary, saying goodbye to cubicles, a regular work commute and the "

item.title: Beat Procrastination in Turbulent Covid Era
item.description:
Procrastination is one of the principle boundaries obstructing you from getting up, settling on the correct choices, and carrying on with the fantasy life you've considered.
Ongoing investigations have shown that individuals regret more the things they haven't done than the things they have done. Furthermore, sensations of disappointment and blame coming about because of botched freedoms will in general remain with individuals any longer.
Some of the time every one of our chances appear to be on our fingertips, however we can't contact them.

item.title: Goal Setting For Success: Plan And Achieve Your Goals
item.description: Are you a student, struggling at setting and achieving your goals? This goal setting course will quickly allow you to start setting personal and professional goals to boost your success. If you are a studente you can start seeing a path to the success you hope for: you will be able to develop a goal setting mindset, find out what you want in life and create a concrete action plan to reach your targets.

item.title: Self-Discipline: Build Habits & Develop a Growth Mindset
item.description: Join our students who have taken our time management, goal setting and focus mastery courses with great results! This course will teach you why and how to develop self-discipline, increase your motivation and stop procrastinating, empowering you to build daily habits for long-term success. Whether you are a student, employee or entrepreneur, you will need to get your job done and, possibly, do it in the best possible way. In fact, we have all faced the frustration of a job we don't like or a task we find difficult to complete, or a passion we have to fight for.

item.title: Educa ed Allena la tua Voce
item.description:
Hai problemi nel farti comprendere senza dover ripetere? Ti senti insicuro dei tuoi mezzi di parola e voce? Parli col timore di non esser capito? Quando comunichi hai problemi nel far comprendere pensieri ed emozioni? Vorresti avere una migliore articolazione ?
Bene! Sei proprio nell'aula virtuale giusta! In questo corso troverai un approccio all'utilizzo e allo sviluppo della voce del tuto differente da quello classico che muove le prime mosse da esercizi sulla vocalizzazione, sicuro fondamentali ma solo dopo aver acquisito piena conoscenza degli organi addetti alla fonazione.

item.title: Laser Focus Mastery 2021
item.description: We live in an era of information overload. We are bombarded with media, technology, entertainment, and notifications every day. It seems there are hundreds of people and things competing for your attention at any given time. There is no wonder why in the last few years, our attention spans have become shorter and our ability to focus has decreased. Not being able to focus can have a negative effect on how successful we are at work and in our personal lives.

item.title: Mental Freedom: From PAIN To POWER
item.description: Isn't It Bizarre That You Were Never Trained In How To Control & Get The Best From Your Own Mind? That Is INSANE! Yet That Is The Hand Everybody Is Dealt! Inside This Course You Will Learn The Secrets Of Psychology That Will Give You The Mental & Emotional Control You Always Wanted! You Are About To Discover: 1) Discover The Secret Of How To SOLVE Problems ... Rather Than Live With Them

item.title: Success Rituals: The Ultimate Path To Success
item.description: In This Success Ritual Online Training Course You Will Learn How To Take Your LIFE & CAREER To The Next Level. This Course Covers ALL The Major Success Rituals You Need To Be Massively Successful … Giving You The Key Tools, Strategies & Techniques You Need Make Your Life & Career Take Off! Learn How To Realize Your FULL Potential! Learning These Key Success Ritual Skills & Techniques Can Help You Be Massively Successful.

item.title: Public Speaking Mastery 2021
item.description:
This course was designed to show even absolute beginners how to become more confident when speaking in public. It includes 5 preformatted lessons packed with easy to understand information.
Discover how to be more confident when speaking in public! Do you know what one of the easiest ways to become a successful public speaker is? Well it is really easy and that is to study other successful speakers. Why not learn from the best?

item.title: The Complete Career Coaching Course - Career Development
item.description: Coaching is a $3 billion a year global business that's growing at rate of 7% annually. And one of the most important segments in this accelerating industry of career coaching where the median rate is $500 per hour. Tens of millions of people either want a new job, change their fields, or substantially improve their performance at their current occupation. We're going to give you the skills to help your clients reach success in both their personal and professional lives.

item.title: How to be a good PR
item.description:
This course is presented by me: Alhassan Ahmed younes Ahmed a good PR in many teams. You will gain a lot of knowledge from my experience in this committee. You will learn how to pass any interview in this field, how to complete any form in registering in any team.
You will learn all of the information of this topic in student activities.
You will learn how to make deals from zero to hero, and I will help you with some important contact numbers of some people are very famous around the world.

item.title: Turning to Religion to reduce STRESS
item.description: Notice: Please do NOT enrol on this course on impulse, thinking you might watch it later. Maybe show an interest on impulse, yes, but before you enrol, watch the Preview videos, read the Course Description and then make a decision. If you then enrol then please start the course as soon as possible. Watch the lectures, look at the workbooks and join in the discussions. Joining my courses is a serious business and I want you to get the most out of your study – but I also want you to enjoy the course.

item.title: Fully Accredited Professional EFT Tapping Certification
item.description: This IAOTH, UK accredited EFT Tapping certification is a masterclass that will enable you to help an endless number of people (including yourself). This concise programme is designed, keeping in mind that you may not have any prior knowledge about Art Therapy, and you want to learn despite your busy schedule. So we have tried to avoid jargon as much as possible and simplified concepts and terminology for you. for EFT is found extremely useful for a wide range of conditions/situations e.

item.title: Stress Management - For Relief From Stress of Life & Work
item.description: Stress Management: Stress can weigh you down until you can hardly think straight! Beat it Today with this Comprehensive Stress Management Course filled with Cutting-Edge Tools & Strategies - Feel better TODAY! Created by Master Therapist & Multiple Award-Winning Educator Prof. Paul J. Cline Ed.D ... Get His 35+ years of Expertise in Helping others Beat Stress ... Condensed down into this Training. Here Are Just A Few Of the Skills You Will Gain:

item.title: Mindfulness para desarrollar la inteligencia emocional
item.description: Te enseño herramientas efectivas y sencillas de aplicar en tu rutina diaria, invirtiendo sólo entre 5 a 15 minutos al día tus emociones no serán más un obstáculo en la consecución de tus metas, tampoco volverás a sentir la culpa o vergüenza de tus impulsos y reacciones emocionales. Tu también puedes gozar de relaciones empáticas, satisfactorias y sin tantas fricciones. Poder solucionar de manera asertiva y consciente las diferencias con tus seres queridos, colegas, clientes y colaboradores es posible.

item.title: Car Repair - Auto Repair & Tuning - Auto Technician Training
item.description: *Printable online certificate available upon completion of course* One of the things that I find most interesting about automotive technology is how it advances and changes. It is also interesting that ideas from many years ago often return to favour. In this course I have therefore concentrated on core technologies, in other words how the technology works, rather than giving too many examples from specific vehicles. However, I have included some examples of Formula 1 technology, arguably the pinnacle of automotive engineering.

item.title: How To Master Your Origin Challenge
item.description:
This course includes: 1 hours of on-demand video instruction 7 video sections Over 30 downloadable exercises & resources Downloadable book chapter Full lifetime access Access on mobile and TV Certificate of completion
What you’ll learn: Learn who and what you are and why. Discover the “origin programming” done by your parents, etc. during your first 18 years of life. Identify which of your traits and relationship characteristics come from your origin programming.

item.title: How To Stop Fear Spiritually
item.description: Do you still allow fear to stop you from taking developmental steps? If you have struggled to put that business idea that has been in your heart for many years to work, then you're dwelling in the cage of fear.  A wise man once said a child is born without fear except for the ones he's taught by society as he grows up. I want you to understand that everyone has the tendency to have fear but those who are great achievers in our society have found a way to consistently kill it!

item.title: Interview Success
item.description: This course is for anyone wanting to do better at Job interviews and successfully get a Job offer in the career you want! Created by practising Recruitment professionals with decades of experience in Business and Executive Recruitment from both Corporate leadership and Recruitment Agency backgrounds, we know what interviewers are looking for and what it takes to stand out - the competition is tougher than ever and we will help you shine!

item.title: The Complete Brain Training Course - Neuroplasticity -
item.description: The Complete Brain Training Course - Neuroplasticity - Brain Training for the Modern Smart Phone Era! You Can Train Your Brain to Think More Clearly and Creatively Brain training is essential if you want do you live up to your full potential as a human being. Your brain is your most important organ, therefore it is essential that you train it for peak performance. Like it or not, every single day your brain is being trained.

item.title: The Miraculous Faith
item.description: Are you struggling to overcome a problem or a challenge in your life, business, or marriage? Do you want simple-to-understand and easy-to-apply descriptions or explanations of the Christian faith that will help you solve those nagging problems in your life, business, or marriage? If those questions apply to you, then this course, ‘The Miraculous Faith: Principles of Christian Faith Manifestation: How to make miracles through faith’ is just the right one for you.

item.title: PNL: Conversación transformacional & Negociación efectiva
item.description: Los seres humanos hemos concebido la idea de que existen variables que están fuera de la gestión individual, por tal motivo se ha exteriorizado la responsabilidad de aquellos pilares transformándonos en víctima de factores externos configurados en paradigmas (política, economía, ciencia y religión) encarnados en autoridades dueñas de conocimientos, reglas y mandamientos que han configurado las estructuras mentales por las cuales construimos nuestras experiencias y realidades. Sin embargo, gracias a la era de la información y a consecuencia de la conectividad producida por el mismo fenómeno, estamos comenzando a cambiar la percepción del tiempo y el conocimiento desde un paradigma lineal e inamovible a otro holístico y constituidos por millares de posibilidades.
